problem_names:
lemma single_use:
  fixes r rs
  shows  "\<bottom> \<star> ([r]@rs) = Some (snd r)"

lemma prec_eq_None_or_equal:
fixes s1 s2
assumes "s1 \<preceq> s2"
shows "s1 = None \<or> s1 = s2"

lemma bot: "\<exists> rs . s = \<bottom> \<star> rs"

proof (prove)

proof (cases s)

proof (state)

 1. s = \<bottom> \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>rs. s = \<bottom> \<star> rs

       s = Some a \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>rs. s = \<bottom> \<star> rs

this:

lemma prec_eq_None_or_equal:
fixes s1 s2
assumes "s1 \<preceq> s2"
shows "s1 = None \<or> s1 = s2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s1 = \<bottom> \<or> s1 = s2
using assms single_use

proof (prove)
using this:
  s1 \<preceq> s2
  \<bottom> \<star> append ?rs [?r] = Some (snd ?r)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s1 = \<bottom> \<or> s1 = s2
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>s1 \<preceq> s2;
     \<And>rs r. \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r] = Some (snd r)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> s1 = \<bottom> \<or> s1 = s2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>s1 \<preceq> s2;
     \<And>rs r. \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r] = Some (snd r)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> s1 = \<bottom> \<or> s1 = s2
assume 1:"s1 \<noteq> None" and 2:"s1 \<noteq> s2"

proof (state)
this:
  s1 \<noteq> \<bottom>
  s1 \<noteq> s2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>s1 \<preceq> s2;
     \<And>rs r. \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r] = Some (snd r)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> s1 = \<bottom> \<or> s1 = s2
obtain r rs where 3:"s1 = \<bottom> \<star> ([r]@rs)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>rs r.
        s1 = \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r] \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using bot

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>rs. ?s = \<bottom> \<star> rs

goal (1 subgoal):

        s1 = \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r] \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using 1

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>rs. ?s = \<bottom> \<star> rs
  s1 \<noteq> \<bottom>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>rs r.
        s1 = \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r] \<Longrightarrow>
        thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (metis append_butlast_last_id pre_RDR.exec.simps(1))

proof (state)
this:
  s1 = \<bottom> \<star> append rs [r]

goal (1 subgoal):

interpretation RDR \<delta> \<gamma> \<bottom>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. RDR (\<bullet>) \<gamma> \<bottom>
proof (unfold_locales)

proof (state)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>s r. contains s r \<Longrightarrow> s \<bullet> r = s
 2. \<And>s r r'.
       fst r \<noteq> fst r' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<gamma> s r = \<gamma> ((s \<bullet> r) \<bullet> r') r
 3. \<And>s1 s2.
       s1 \<preceq> s2 \<and> s2 \<preceq> s1 \<Longrightarrow> s1 = s2
 4. \<And>s1 s2. \<exists>s. is_glb s s1 s2
 5. \<And>s1 s2 s3 rs.
       \<lbrakk>s1 \<preceq> s2; s2 \<preceq> s3;
        s3 = s1 \<star> rs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>rs' rs''.
                            s2 = s1 \<star> rs' \<and>
                            s3 = s2 \<star> rs'' \<and>
                            set rs' \<subseteq> set rs \<and>
                            set rs'' \<subseteq> set rs
 6. \<And>s. \<bottom> \<preceq> s
fix s r

 4. \<And>s1 s2. \<exists>s. is_glb s s1 s2
 5. \<And>s1 s2 s3 rs.
       \<lbrakk>s1 \<preceq> s2; s2 \<preceq> s3;
        s3 = s1 \<star> rs\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>rs' rs''.
                            s2 = s1 \<star> rs' \<and>
                            s3 = s2 \<star> rs'' \<and>
                            set rs' \<subseteq> set rs \<and>
                            set rs'' \<subseteq> set rs
 6. \<And>s. \<bottom> \<preceq> s

        s3 = s1 \<star> rs\<rbrakk>

                            set rs' \<subseteq> set rs \<and>
                            set rs'' \<subseteq> set rs
 3. \<And>s. \<bottom> \<preceq> s
